businesses.name: ReynoldsBusbyLee Ltd
businesses.days: Days open:
businesses.offerdescription: Is your organisation struggling to achieve the results you expect? We are offering local businesses a 'free power hour' in which we talk to your senior leadership team to understand any challenges and concerns. If a business isn't doing as well as expected, in our experience, that's usually because the customers' voice is not being heard. We'll then present a report of our findings with recommendations. If this strikes a chord we'll then go on to work with you to find and implement solutions to move your business forward.  Our clients including AmEx, Biscuiteers, Donald Russell, Hoburne Holidays, Ocado and Haymarket to name just a few.  We look forward to working with you too!

businesses.days: Days open:
businesses.offertitle: 20% discount on counselling and life coaching
businesses.offerdescription: 20% discount off your first session (Normally £60). I work with individuals; adults and adolescents and offer couples work. I have undertaken pre-adoption counselling with couples when referred through an agency such as a local authority.  I can see people for brief interventions as well as longer term options. Many individuals looking to understand more in-depth issues prefer open ended contracts. I am flexible when considering how often to see a client as long as clinically I feel the counselling will be beneficial in this way.

businesses.name: CPR Financial LLP
businesses.address1: First Floor Regal House 70 London Road
businesses.days: Days open:
businesses.offerdescription: What is Equity Release? It’s simple, really. Equity release lets you get cash from the value that’s tied up in your home. And you don’t have to move house or downsize. It’s a popular way to get the money you need for whatever reason, for example: Repay interest only mortgages Boost Retirement income Pay for home improvements Pay for care fees To help family on the property ladder Tax planning 5 key reasons why equity release is becoming so popular: •The money you release is tax free •You can still own your home •There's no need for monthly repayments •You can use the money however you wish •You can take the money in one lump sum or smaller instalments
